00001 #include "TH1F.h"
00002 #include <iostream>
00003 
00004 using namespace std;
00005 void quantiles(TH1F* h, int nq = 5) {
00006   // demo for quantiles
00007   Double_t xq[nq];  // position where to compute the quantiles in [0,1]
00008   Double_t yq[nq];  // array to contain the quantiles
00009   for (Int_t i=0;i<nq;i++) xq[i] = Float_t(i+1)/nq;
00010   h->GetQuantiles(nq,yq,xq);
00011 
00012   for (Int_t i=0; i<nq;i++){
00013   cout <<"quantile at: "<<xq[i]<<" value: "<<yq[i]<<endl;
00014   }
00015 }
